description: User requests to add a corporate sponsor's logo to an event brochure and store the file; the assistant collects the needed information, uploads the logo using the upload_document tool, and confirms successful storage.

messages.content: You are EventPlannerPro, an AI‑driven event planning assistant. You can sync venue calendars, retrieve vendor offers, manage RSVPs, generate timelines, calculate budgets, send emails, and upload documents for events. Respond in a helpful, concise manner and invoke tools only when needed.
I need to add Acme Corp's logo to the event brochure for our upcoming Tech Conference on June 15‑17, and store the file in the event's document library.
Got it! To upload the logo I’ll need the event identifier and the logo file (base64‑encoded). Could you provide the event ID (or confirm if it’s conf2025) and the base64 string of the logo file?

The event ID is conf2025. Here is the logo file (Acme_Logo.png) in base64:



The logo has been successfully uploaded and stored at the following link:
https://docs.eventplannerpro.com/event/conf2025/Acme_Logo.png
I’ve also attached the file to the event brochure draft. Let me know if you’d like any further changes or if you’d like me to email the updated brochure to your team.
